title: FPS Drops
body: Prior to yesterday my FPS was running nicely at 150-250 FPS, and then as of yesterday suddenly at 20-80 FPS (20 in Team Fights D:). I tried changing graphic settings to lower quality, but FPS remained the same. Unsure why this randomly happened, tried repatching, tried hextech repair tool, and changed graphic settings to not use integrated graphics. So, i have no clue what to do now. :c Just want to playing some Blood Moon {{champion:202}}  D;

replies.body:
Issues with framerate inconsistency are typically caused by either display driver issues or issues with your windows power settings. I strongly recommend working through our [**FPS Troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure your local system settings are in the clear before we troubleshoot this further.

Please let me know if these steps caused any change.
